name: Terra Nova 3D
description:
Explore the world of Terra Nova... in 3D!

WASD to move
Mouse to look
Space to jump
Shift to run
RMB to zoom

Created during the Imagining Indigenous Worlds with Unity Skins Video Game Workshop hosted in partnership with the Initiative for Indigenous Futures (IIF) and Western Arctic Moving Picutures (WAMP).

Music by
Meydän (Free Music Archive)

Sound effects by
ivolipa (freesound)
